fields.excerpt_html: Learn how to generate excerpts with gatsby-transformer-remark and work around the lack of the excerpt_separator option in gatsby-plugin-mdx.

frontmatter.title: Generating excerpts using GatsbyJS Markdown plugins

fields.excerpt_html:
While being situated in Pune, India, I recently did a remote internship with
a New York-based company. They shipped me a laptop and peripheral devices via
FedEx and what followed was a nightmare.
